mapper.sql: id, parent_id, sort, path, disabled, component, icon, menu_type, name, permission, description, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, deleted
mapper.select:
SELECT sp.permission FROM sys_menu sp LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu srp ON sp.id = srp.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.role_id = srp.role_id WHERE sur.user_id = #{userId}
AND ( permission IS NOT NULL OR permission != '' ) AND srp.deleted = FALSE AND sur.deleted = FALSE AND sp.deleted = FALSE

SELECT sm.id, sm.path, sm.permission, sm.component, sm.name FROM sys_menu sm LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu srp ON sm.id = srp.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.role_id = srp.role_id WHERE sur.user_id = #{userId} AND sm.menu_type = #{code}

SELECT DISTINCT (sm.id) as id, sm.parent_id, sm.path, sm.permission, sm.component, sm.name, sm.icon, sm.menu_type, sm.sort, sm.keep_alive, sm.in_frame, sm.is_url, sm.route_name FROM sys_menu sm LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu srp ON sm.id = srp.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.role_id = srp.role_id WHERE sur.user_id = #{userId} AND sm.enabled = true AND sm.deleted = false AND srp.deleted = FALSE ORDER BY sm.sort
